meanings.definition: A rare sulfate mineral with formula KAl₂(SO₄)₄·6H₂O.
meanings.english_definition: A rare sulfate mineral with formula KAl₂(SO₄)₄·6H₂O.

examples.sentence: The chemical formula of Alushtite is KAl₂(SO₄)₄·6H₂O.

etymology.value: Named after Alushta, a location in Crimea where it was first discovered.
